definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Spread abundant quantities of cream and massage carefully until absorbed.
sentences.chinese: 塗抹足量的霜，並且仔細按摩，直至完全吸收。

sentences.english: In high enough quantities it can cause serious kidney problems in people.
sentences.chinese: 足量的三聚氰胺可能導致人們出現嚴重腎臟問題。

sentences.english: Be sure there are plenty of clean utensils and platters.
sentences.chinese: 確保有足量清潔的用具和盤子。

sentences.english: When the antifoggant was adsorbed on the surface of the crystal, few protrusions were found.
sentences.chinese: 表面吸附足量的防灰霧劑後，晶體表面突起不明顯。

sentences.english: Drink plenty of water and rest in a cool place.
sentences.chinese: 喝足量的水，在涼快的地方休息。

sentences.english: However, men die of shock even after apparently adequate blood replacement.
sentences.chinese: 但是，甚至在顯然足量補血後，有人仍然會休克致死。

sentences.english: Place guajillo chilies in medium saucepan; add enough water to cover generously and bring to boil.
sentences.chinese: 將辣椒放在中等煎鍋中，加入足量水燒開。

sentences.english: Now I drink plenty of water to keep my kidneys healthy.
sentences.chinese: 現在我用足量的飲水保證腎臟的健康。

sentences.english: A mineral that contains enough iron to be a factor in stainless steel production.
sentences.chinese: 一種含足量鐵以生產不鏽鋼的礦石。

sentences.english: Students are advised to bring plenty of water and sunscreen.
sentences.chinese: 建議參加者自帶足量水和防曬霜。

sentences.english: Mix baking soda with just enough water to form a thick paste.
sentences.chinese: 將小蘇打和足量水混合，形成稠膏。

sentences.english: An ace spy came to his city with plenty of accommodation.
sentences.chinese: 一個一流的間諜帶着足量的設備來到他的城市。

definition: Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
